text: George Mark Malloch Brown, Baron Malloch-Brown (born 16 September 1953) is a British diplomat, communications consultant, journalist and former politician. He was president of Open Society Foundations since 2021. For a short time in 2006, he was the 2nd Deputy Secretary-General of the United Nations. ==Notes== ==References== Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:Deputy Secretaries-General of the United Nations Category:Labour Party (UK) people Category:Politicians from London Category:United Kingdom Life Peers
title: Mark Malloch Brown
